column1: Wildberry Pancakes and Cafe////I ordered the two scrambled eggs
column4: pancake-plate. Each of those items were the best I have ever had. The bacon was thick cut and extremely flavorful (note that there is no such thing as bad bacon
column7: or above). I'm from out of town and this was my first visit to Chicago. If I'm ever back
column8: Wildberry will sure be on my itinerary.
